roleset.name: cut-off or aviod standard procedure

example.text: But now it looks like we may shortciruit that.

roleset.note: Frame file created by Arrick. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'shortcircuit' based on sentences in ebc. Verbnet class 45.4, other members include activate, age, balance, blur, darken, hasten, laminate, magnetize, revive, ripen, sicken, stabilize, sour, tilt, unwind, whiten.
